BattleCommands

Class Ability

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleCommands.BattleCommand
      • BattleCommands.Ability
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssassinAbility, DefensiveAbility, OffensiveAbility, SoldierAbility

    public abstract class Ability
extends BattleCommand
    Ability is an abstract class that extends BattleCommand. It provides very general functions for all abilities such as shared getters and setters and defines abstract abilities to be declared once more fields are known.
    Author:
    Kevin

    • Method Detail

      • getClassOwner

        public abstract java.lang.String getClassOwner()
        Return the name of the class who owns this ability. Don't know the class yet thus the method is abstract.
        Returns:
        The name of the class who owns this ability.

      • useBattleCommand

        public abstract void useBattleCommand(Hero hero,
                                      Hero target)
                               throws MaximumStatException
        Use the current ability. Don't know exactly what the ability does yet thus the method is abstract. Throws MaximumStatException if the defensive ability or item used cannot increase the statistic that it affects.
        Specified by:
        useBattleCommand in class BattleCommand
        Parameters:
        hero: - current acting hero
        target: - target hero
        Throws:
        MaximumStatException - if the defensive ability or item used cannot increase the statistic that it affects.

      • getAbility

        public static Ability getAbility(Hero hero,
                                 java.lang.String ability)
        Returns the hero's ability from the hero's ability set by it's key. Why static? Don't need to have an ability instance to get an ability from the Map.
        Parameters:
        hero: - hero to get ability from
        ability: - name to find in hero's HashMap
        Returns:
        Ability
